snippet.title: Gameplay Movierooms Pre-ALPHA 2023 - Level 1930 (in development)
snippet.description:
Index:
00:12 - To build the "Projections rooms", "Toillettes", "Staff room" and "Hall" with his equipment and decorations
00:56 - Build and erase free walls
1:18 - Movie posters,at minute 2:52 choice of films to hang inside them (improving)
1:22 - Lights in cinema
1:50 - Movie Shop and rent (the catalog will be filled with more films of the decades 1930)
1:55 - Projections screening (movie scheduling in the rooms)
2:10 - Hiring/staff recruitment
2:22 - Arrival of customers
3:02 - Editing (improving and provisional)
3:20 - Mouse button: equipment info, wear status and possibility of removing it or, call handyman to fix it
Important: the characters and their animations are provissory, they will be changed according to the atmosphere of the period.
3:48 - Archive buttom and infos
4:20 - Viewing a projected film
4:36 - Daily balance sheet
4:38 - Day 2
4:42 - Employee management screen
5:12 - Projector on fire (rescue animation in development)
5:22 - Colour customisation of walls and floors

Follow the team and the development of the game:
https://linktr.ee/madpumpkins

Thank you!
Mad Pumpkins team
